msContents.summary: Tax register, recording the daily collection of money taxes in the village of Karanis; the name of each tax-payer is cross-referenced with a page of another register, where taxpayers were listed geographically

msItemStruct.note: Due to the size of this tax roll (P.Mich. IV/1, 225 + IV/2, 358), its content has been divided in the present database into several cards (one for each column).
Pub. status: Recto; Verso of col. 33 is blank

supportDesc.support: 1 papyrus ; col. 33-34: 35.7 x 29.2 cm; total size: ***

condition.ab: Col. 33: complete (papyrus cut off left of col. 33 when housed in glass)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Onnophris son of Pnepheros and Thaesis grandson of Phanomgeus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Phaesis son of Pekmeis alias Heuremon and Sambathion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 244)
Sabinus son of Pasoknopaios and Tapetheus grandson of Horos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 222)
Satabous son of Dioskoros and Taorion (Tahorion) grandson of Satabous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 226)
Onnophris son of Sisois and Thaesis grandson of Petsiris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Psenesis son of Pharmennion (Parmenion) and Tkonnos grandson of Psenesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Horion son of Petheus and Komonis grandson of Esouris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 249)
Agathopous, doulos of Thermouthis alias Tpaietis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 148)
Orsenouphis son of Petheus and Tapetheus grandson of Horion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 194)
Kastor son of Artemas and Thaesis grandson of Heron (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 181)
Priscus alias Pasoxis son of Satabous and Thermouthis grandson of Pnepheros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 215)
Mysthes son of Petheus and Tasoucharion grandson of Mysthes (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 189)
Limnais (Limaios) son of Onnophris and Ptolema grandson of Satabous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 185)
Petermouthis son of Kastor and Tasoucharion grandson of Heraklas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 210)
Esouris son of Kames and Thaesis grandson of Heras (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 164)
Onnophris son of Pnepheros and Tapetheus grandson of Phanomgeus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Sarapion son of Thaisas, doulos of Syros alias Ptolemaios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Phaesis son of Pasoxis and Thaesis grandson of Polyntikos (Polyndikos) (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 244)
Harpagathes son of Pnepheros and Tapetheus grandson of Pekmeis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 155)
Petaus son of Onnophris and Tkateis grandson of Petaus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 208)
Horon (Horion) son of Aphrodisios and Tapetaus grandson of Onnophris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Pnepheros son of Pasoxis and Thakiaris (Thakialis) grandson of Petesouchos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Pnepheros son of Petheus and Thaisas grandson of Petesouchos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Papeis (Papeeis) son of Ptolemaios and Heras grandson of Pnepheros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 197)
Sarapion son of Apollonios and Thermouthis grandson of Harpagathes (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Phanomgeus son of Phanomgeus and Taptosiris grandson of Phanomgeus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 245)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
